Uses of Package
com.att.research.xacml.api.pep

  • Packages that use com.att.research.xacml.api.pep 
    Package Description
    com.att.research.xacml.api.pep  
    com.att.research.xacml.std.pep  
  • Classes in com.att.research.xacml.api.pep used by com.att.research.xacml.api.pep 
    Class and Description
    PEPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    PEPEngineFactory
    PEPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating PEPEngine instances.
    PEPException
    PEPException extends Exception to implement exceptions thrown by PEPEngine and PEPEngineFactory classes.
  • Classes in com.att.research.xacml.api.pep used by com.att.research.xacml.std.pep 
    Class and Description
    PEPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    PEPEngineFactory
    PEPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating PEPEngine instances.
    PEPException
    PEPException extends Exception to implement exceptions thrown by PEPEngine and PEPEngineFactory classes.
